keywords.DESCRIPTION: Increase damage, #yBlock and #yPotency of a card by #b50%. Can be stacked additively. #yEnhance is removed after the card is played.
Remove one level of #yUpgrade and any #yEnhance or #yStasis from a card.
Prevent a card from being #yExhausted once and discard it instead. Cannot be stacked.
Potency is the power of a rune when it is #yCrafted.
Create a rune using #yElements. If you don't have enough, gain that many instead. (max runes:7)
Elements (Ignis, Terra and Aqua) are spent to #yCraft runes and are used for other utilities.
Destroy a rune and activate its effect twice. Passive effects will be removed at the start of your next turn.
Rune: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
Rune: Deals damage to random enemies.
Rune: Gain #yBlock.
Rune: #yRetain a card.
Rune: #yRetain two cards.
Rune: Gain #yThorns.
Rune: Gain #yPotency
Rune: Set #yPlated #yArmor to at least its #yPotency.
Ruin: Give a random class card each turn.
Rune: Give a random upgraded class card each turn.
Rune: Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Rune: Heals on #yBreak.
Rune: No effect.
Rune: Deals damage to random enemy and gain Block.
Removed until end of combat. Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.
Set your current HP, Block, and Elements to the saved values. NL Exhaust.
WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW
